Package index

Generic Report

The Generic Report Rmd template allows the user to create a report in RMarkdown and render it directly from R into a Word document following the style of the Generic Report Word template that is used as a reference document by the Generic Report Rmd template.

ActivityTable
Class that defines the Activity Table in the Generic Report
ChangelogTable
Class that defines the Changelog Table in the Generic Report
ChangelogTableRow
Class that defines the Changelog Table Row Table in the Generic Report
SignaturesTable
Class that defines the Signatures Table in the Generic Report
SignaturesTableRow
Class that defines the Signatures Table Row in the Generic Report
TitlePage get_title_page
Class that defines the Title Page in the Generic Report
rmd_render()
Rmd Sample Size renderer
generic_report_template()
Generic Report Template location

Automated Reporting

Allows the user to automatically update all or selected tables/figures in a Word document.

ReplaceOutputs
Class that defines the Replace Outputs
